level.heading: Gravity and pressure tanks.
level.text: ยง 27-965 Gravity and pressure tanks. When the requirements of sections 27-963 and 27-964 of this article are not met, a pressure or gravity tank or other device shall be used, complying with the applicable provisions of subchapter sixteen of this chapter and reference standard RS 17-2, RS 17-2A or RS 17-2B.
